title: Stacking
toast-text: By confirming, you accept the terms of the stacking, and your assets will be blocked for 14 days without the possibility of cancellation

features.gift: Rewards are automatically credited to your deposit every 14 days
features.lock: Simple and transparent income generation conditions

info:
The mechanics of staking in the app

Staking is a simple and effective way to make money on your assets. You invest funds, and at the end of the term you receive a profit in the form of tokens. There are several staking options available in our application, depending on the selected token and the amount of investments.

General conditions for all types of staking:

  • Staking period: 14 days (fixed for all tokens).
  • Early withdrawal of funds: not provided.
  • Commissions: There are no staking fees on our platform.
  • Accrual of rewards: in the form of tokens at the end of the staking period.
  • Accrual of rewards: in the form of tokens at the end of the staking period.

Examples of calculations:

1. USDT Staking

  • Minimum amount: $10.
  • Maximum amount: it is not limited.
  • Profitability: you get Like and Love tokens.
    • Like tokens: 6-8% per annum.
    • Love tokens: 10-17% per annum (the larger the stake amount, the higher the yield of Love tokens).
Examples of calculating profitability (at a rate of 7% in 14 days):
  • By investing $10, you will receive 46.30 Like tokens and 1,400 Love tokens.
  • By investing $100, you will receive 462.92 Like tokens and 15,400 Love tokens (Love yield is 10%).
  • By investing $1,000, you will receive 4,629.2 Like tokens and 1,582,000 Love tokens (Love yield is 13%).
  • By investing $10,000, you will receive 46,292 Like tokens and 16,380,000 Love tokens (Love yield is 17%).

2. Staking TON

  • Minimum amount: 2 TON.
  • Maximum amount: it is not limited.
  • Profitability: you get Like and Love tokens.
    • Like tokens: 6-8% per annum.
    • Love tokens: 10-17% per annum (the profitability of Love increases with an increase in the amount of staking).
Examples of calculating profitability (at a rate of 7% in 14 days):
  • By investing 2 TON, you will receive 48.6 Like tokens and 1,400 Love tokens.
  • By investing 20 TON, you will receive 486,066 Like tokens and 15,400 Love tokens (the yield of Love is 10%).
  • By investing 200 TON, you will receive 4,860.6 Like tokens and 1,582,000 Love tokens (Love yield is 13%).
  • By investing 2000 TON, you will receive 48,606 Like tokens and 16,380,000 Love tokens (Love yield is 17%).

3. Staking Like

  • Minimum amount: 1 Like.
  • Maximum amount: it is not limited.
  • Profitability: 7.2-9% per annum.

4. Staking Love

  • Minimum amount: 1 Love.
  • Maximum amount: it is not limited.
  • Yield: 13-17% per annum.
